title: Estimating Factor-Based Spot Volatility Matrices with Noisy and Asynchronous High-Frequency Data
abstract: arXiv:2403.06246v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: We propose a new estimator of high-dimensional spot volatility matrices satisfying a low-rank plus sparse structure from noisy and asynchronous high-frequency data collected for an ultra-large number of assets. The noise processes are allowed to be temporally correlated, heteroskedastic, asymptotically vanishing and dependent on the efficient prices. We define a kernel-weighted pre-averaging method to jointly tackle the microstructure noise and asynchronicity issues, and we obtain uniformly consistent estimates for latent prices. We impose a continuous-time factor model with time-varying factor loadings on the price processes, and estimate the common factors and loadings via a local principal component analysis. Assuming a uniform sparsity condition on the idiosyncratic volatility structure, we combine the POET and kernel-smoothing techniques to estimate the spot volatility matrices for both the latent prices and idiosyncratic errors. translated_title: 从噪声和异步高频数据中估算基于因子的现货波动率矩阵
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种新的估算方法，用于从噪声和异步高频数据中收集的大量资产的现货波动率矩阵，该方法满足低秩加稀疏结构。我们允许噪声过程在时间上相关，异方差，渐近消失，并依赖于有效价格。我们定义了一种核加权的预平均方法，同时处理微观结构噪声和不同步性问题，并且对潜在价格获得了一致估计。我们对价格过程施加了一个具有时间变化因子载荷的连续时间因子模型，并通过局部主成分分析估计了公共因子和载荷。假设对特质波动率结构有一个均匀的稀疏条件，我们将POET和核平滑技术相结合，估计潜在价格和特质误差的现货波动率矩阵。
tldr: 提出了一种从噪声和异步高频数据中估算现货波动率矩阵的方法，通过核加权的预平均方法处理微观结构噪声和不同步性问题，通过连续时间因子模型估计公共因子和载荷，并结合POET和核平滑技术来实现估计。
en_tdlr: A method is proposed to estimate spot volatility matrices from noisy and asynchronous high-frequency data, addressing microstructure noise and asynchronicity issues through a kernel-weighted pre-averaging method, estimating common factors and loadings via a continuous-time factor model, and combining POET and kernel-smoothing techniques for estimation.
